title: Healthcare Plan
description: Details of a Health Insurance product/plan provided by an organization.

xdm:planID.Title: Plan ID
xdm:planID.description: Unique identifier of the insurance plan.

xdm:planType.Title: Plan Type
xdm:planType.description: This indicates if the plan is primary,secondary or tertiary plan.

xdm:isActive.Title: Is Active
xdm:isActive.description: Indicates whether the plan is active.
